refnamediv.refpurpose: Creates and runs a numbered instrument instance.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Creates an instance of another instrument and is used as if it were an opcode.

refsect1.title: Syntax
refsect1.synopsis: a1, [...] [, a8] subinstr instrnum [, p4] [, p5] [...]

refsect1.title: Initialization
refsect1.para: instrnum -- Number of the instrument to be called.
insname -- A string (in double-quotes) representing a named instrument.

refsect1.title: Performance
refsect1.para: a1, ..., a8 -- The audio output from the called instrument. This is generated using the signal output opcodes.
p4, p5, ... -- Additional input values the are mapped to the called instrument p-fields, starting with p4.

The called instrument's p2 and p3 values will be identical to the host instrument's values. While the host instrument can control its own duration, any such attempts inside the called instrument will most likely have no effect.
